name: Backfire
description: A small action game for 1-2 players, walk about and blast as many enemies as you can, and hopefully make it to the end.
minimum_requirements: OS: Tested on Windows 8.1 Processor: Tested on AMD A4 Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: AMD Radeon R3 Storage: 250 MB available space Additional Notes: It should be very non-demanding system-wise
